flounder.devices

Class DeviceDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.devices.DeviceDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModule

    public class DeviceDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModule
    Manages the creation, updating and destruction of the display.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DeviceDisplay(int width, int height, java.lang.String title, boolean vsync, boolean antialiasing, int samples, boolean fullscreen)
      Creates a new GLFW display.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeviceDisplay

        protected DeviceDisplay(int width,
                        int height,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        boolean vsync,
                        boolean antialiasing,
                        int samples,
                        boolean fullscreen)
        Creates a new GLFW display.
        Parameters:
        width - The window width in pixels.
        height - The window height in pixels.
        title - The window title.
        vsync - If the window will use vSync..
        antialiasing - If OpenGL will use antialiasing.
        samples - How many MFAA samples should be done before swapping buffers. Zero disables multisampling. GLFW_DONT_CARE means no preference.
        fullscreen - If the window will start fullscreen.

        public void setSamples(int samples)
